channel.title: Py Humble Books
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Books bundles!

item.title: Japanese Language, Culture, and Travel by Stone Bridge Press
item.content:encoded: Prepping for a trip to Japan? Or are you simply interested in learning the ins and outs of this beautiful country? This bundle of books will help you brush up on your language skills, appreciate Japan’s culture, and plan an itinerary for your future journeys. Kanji Pict-o-Graphix will help you wrap your head around the hardest parts of the Japanese written language with helpful mnenomic techniques. Full of useful guides and photos, Tokyo Stroll: A Guide to City Sidetracks and Easy Explorations encourages unstructured exploration of this exciting city. Just Enough provides valuable insights on living fully and sustainably, inspired by lessons learned in Japan’s past. Pay what you want for all these books and more and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation.

item.title: Comics for Anime Lovers by ABLAZE
item.content:encoded: Anime fans, it’s time to reaffirm your love for the still image with this collection of comics published by Ablaze, brimming with thrilling stories that span the genres! Based on the long-running manga and anime series, Saint Seiya: Knights Of The Zodiac - Time Odyssey has the brave Knights struggling to prevent the renegade god Chronos from undoing time itself. Space Pirate Captain Harlock is a brand-new story set in the timeline of the classic anime series, where the valiant captain and his crew fight to save Earth from terrifying menace from another world. Crueler Than Dead provides a graphic, ultraviolent take on the zombie story set in a Tokyo ravaged by the undead. Get all these comics and over 30 more and help support the Starlight Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Photoshop, Illustrator, and More for Creatives by Peachpit
item.content:encoded: Designers and artists, get the most out of tools like Photoshop, Illustrator and more with this bundle, packed with books from leading imprints like Peachpit, Adobe Press, and New Riders. The Adobe Photoshop Book for Digital Photographers teaches you today’s cutting edge editing techniques step-by-step with zero fluff. Adobe Creative Cloud Classroom in a Book will teach you the ins and outs of this essential suite covering web, print, video, and more. Photoshop on the iPad provides expert instruction to help you take your creativity on the go. Get all these and more—20+ books in total—and help support the Hidden Genius Project with your purchase.

item.title: Paranoia 25th Anniversary RPG Mega Bundle by Mongoose Publishing
item.content:encoded: Get ready for countless evenings of misadventure and mistrust with the long-running and darkly comic sci-fi TTRPG Paranoia! This bundle includes everything you need to play this cult classic RPG, packed with over 30 rulebooks, sourcebooks, adventures, and more! The Paranoia Service Pack 1 Core Rulebook gives you the ground rules for the classic Paranoia experience—you’re an enforcer serving the Computer that runs this dystopian society, and your job is to eliminate any threats to the status quo (which often includes your fellow players). You’ll also get other core rulebooks that span the scope of this zany world, including the High Programmers Core Rulebooks, which puts you in the shoes of some of the Computer’s more exalted servants, and the Internal Security Core Rulebook, where you’ll play as Paranoia version of special ops. Pay what you want for the ultimate passport to this classic RPG and help support One Tree Planted.

item.title: Be a Graphic Designer & Visual Artist by Chronicle Books
item.content:encoded: Chart your course through the worlds of art and design with this bundle of books, full of indispensable instruction, guidance, and inspiration. The acclaimed How to Be A Graphic Designer Without Losing Your Soul provides practical advice and philosophical guidance to help you kick off and maintain a successful career in the field. The Creative Business Handbook gives you concrete, actionable advice about making a living from your creative work. If you want to dive deep in typographic design, Grid Systems teaches you the ins-and-outs of compositions via extensive examples from top design houses and ad firms. Pay what you want for an invaluable education in art and design and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation!

item.title: Java 2024 by O'Reilly
item.content:encoded: Add one of the most popular programming languages to your coding repertoire with this bundle of books on all things Java from O’Reilly! You’ll get a host of books on this powerful and versatile language, like A Functional Approach to Java, which will bring you up to speed on the essential concepts and practices of the functional programming paradigm. Also included are books that cover other languages relevant to Java devs, like Java to Kotlin, which will help you get up and running on the most popular language for native Android apps. Pay what you want for 15 books in total, and help support Code for America with your purchase!

item.title: Amigurumi and Crochet from Open Road Media
item.content:encoded: Dive into the charming world of amigurumi and all things crocheting with this captivating collection of books! Included are a host of books designed to guide you through creating your very own cute crocheted companions, including the sumptuously illustrated Edward's Menagerie, which provides patterns and instructions for 40 adorable animals. With Crochet Iconic Women, you’ll bring to life some of history’s greats with your hook, from Marie Curie to Billie Holiday. And if you need a primer, the Complete Crochet Course has you covered for the basics. Pay what you want for this collection of 20+ books and help support Children’s Miracle Network!

item.title: Spice Up Your Love Life by Chronicle
item.description: Find fulfillment in love and intimacy
item.content:encoded: Enrich your most intimate relationships in the spirit of Valentine’s Day with this bundle of books full of tips, stories, and candid guidance on the topics of love and intimacy. In My Pleasure, sexual wellness expert Laura Delarato provides a guide to cultivate an enriching sex life regardless of your relationship status. Me Without You will help you celebrate enduring love with heartwarming cartoons by famed illustrators Lisa Swerling and Ralph Lazar. Get these and more—over 20 books in total covering a range of topics related to the heart and the bedroom—and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation.

item.title: Cybersecurity 2024 from Packt
item.content:encoded: Get up-to-date skills that’ll help you keep your systems locked down and hackerproof with this bundle of books on all topics cybersecurity. Looking for a new job in this exciting field? Hack the Cybersecurity Interview will arm you with the knowledge to nail the technical interview and impress potential employers. Practical Threat Detection Engineering will teach you how to enhance your organization's security using open source tools via practical examples and hands-on projects. Cryptography Algorithms explores the cutting edge of modern cryptography, from classical techniques to quantum cryptography and blockchain innovations. Pay what you want for all these and more—over 20 books in total—and help support Special Effect with your purchase.
